name: Pursuit of Happiness (Epic MegaJam 2017)
description:
MegaJam theme: "However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light"

Backstory:

Once in a hundred years, fearsome solemn demons make their appearance.
Those demons take down the whole world.
But there's hope... A farmers alliance, protecting the Earth.
Their methods were simple but effective: bringing people joy.
However vast the darkness, they must supply their own light.

Some gameplay moments:
  • You accidentally change weapons after some time
  • Ninja - vanishes for a short period of time
  • Demon - saddens enemies around him
  • Fatty - explodes when cheered
Assets used from outside of jam time:
  • Octostone textures from https://freepbr.com/materials/octogon-stone-cobble-pbr-material/
  • Settings menu from https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/quality-game-settings
  • Main menu background from https://images.google.com/
